resources.string: Action Everywhere is a Getting Things Done (GTD®) action list manager for Thinking Rock.

Action Everywhere is a Getting Things Done (GTD®) action list manager for Thinking Rock (www.trgtd.com.au). It synchronizes your Thinking Rock data (.trx and ReviewActions.xml files) using Dropbox to your phone. The app starts directly with your action lists. You can also create customized lists. It has been designed to work with Thinking Rock 3.4.2; it might work with earlier versions.

Updates in this version:
 - Fixed crash on startup
 - Fixed bug on starting voice recognition
 - Fixed bug on sending thought

Step 1: Link Action Everywhere to Dropbox (Menu button, Preferences)
Dropbox will create a new folder: \Apps\Action Everywhere.

 Step 2: In Thinking Rock save your file (.trx) permanently in this new folder (File > Save as: My Dropbox\Apps\Action Everywhere)
Restart Thinking Rock.

 Step 3: Select the file (in Preferences).

 Step 4: Return to the home screen. (Back button, the file will now be downloaded)

Setup instructions:
 Step 1: Link Action Everywhere to Dropbox (Menu button, Preferences)
Dropbox will create a new folder: \Apps\Action Everywhere.

 Step 2: In Thinking Rock save your file (.trx) permanently in this new folder (File > Save as: My Dropbox\Apps\Action Everywhere)
Restart Thinking Rock.

 Step 3: Select the file (in Preferences).

 Step 4: Return to the home screen. (Back button, the file will now be downloaded)


Besides the standard Thinking Rock lists, you can create your own customized lists. Select (Menu --> Edit Lists). After adding your list you should open it to apply your own filters (with the custom list opened select: Menu -> Filter).


Limited support for Thinking Rock filters:
 Not all filters from Thinking Rock are supported in this app. This may lead to some inconsistencies.
 - Filters for Context, Status, Topic and Action Date are supported.
 - Special filters like "Exclude if Null" are not supported.
 After applying changes to filters and lists in Thinking Rock, restart Thinking Rock for the changes to be saved and synced.


Submitting new thoughts:
 You can configure Thinking Rock with an email address to receive new thoughts (Tools -> Options Miscellaneous -> Email). Set this email in Preferences and you can send new thoughts from Action Everywhere.


Sorting of lists:
 The order in which actions in a list are sorted is pre-determined and can not be changed. The order is:
 - Before today
 - Today
 - Every action without a date
 - Future actions
